subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: New Mexico State fired Coach Hal Mumme on Tuesday, ending a tumultuous four-year run. The Aggies lost seven straight games to end the season 3-9 and 1-7 in the Western Athletic Conference. They lost, 49-0, at home to Boise State and ended the season last weekend with a 47-2 defeat at Utah State.
